subtitle: Colourful, delicious and ideal for all the family.

method.text: Place the oil and onion in a large casserole dish and mix well. Cover and cook on 100% (FULL) power for 3 min. Stir in the chicken and continue to cook on 100% (FULL) power for 5 min, stirring once, halfway through.
Add the tomatoes, chorizo sausage, garlic, turmeric or saffron, and rice. Cook on 100% (FULL) power for 2 min.
Pour over half the stock. Bring to the boil and then reduce to 50% (MEDIUM) power. Continue to cook, covered, for 15-20 min, stirring every 5 min and adding more stock as necessary.
Add the peas and season to taste. Cook uncovered on 50% (MEDIUM) power for 2-3 min. Fork over the rice before serving.

title: Catalan style chicken risotto - microwave
